# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

add_subdirectory(protos)
add_subdirectory(unittests)
add_subdirectory(bin)

add_library(yt-chyt-server)


target_compile_options(yt-chyt-server PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
)

target_include_directories(yt-chyt-server PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/double-conversion
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Util/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/XML/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/re2
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/rapidjson/include
)

target_link_libraries(yt-chyt-server PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-query-engine
  yt-chyt-client
  chyt-client-protos
  chyt-server-protos
  ytserver
  server-lib-chunk_pools
  yt-yt-ytlib
  yt-library-clickhouse_discovery
  yt-library-clickhouse_functions
  yt-library-monitoring
  library-tracing-jaeger
  library-profiling-perf
  yt-library-server_program
  cpp-yt-mlock
  contrib-clickhouse-src
  clickhouse-base-base
  contrib-deprecated-clickhouse_data_streams_compat
)

target_sources(yt-chyt-server PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/block_output_stream.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/bootstrap.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/ch_to_yt_converter.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/clickhouse_invoker.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/clickhouse_server.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/query_registry.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/remote_source.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/table_functions_list_dir.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/table_functions.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/table_traverser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/table.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/tcp_handler.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/user_defined_sql_objects_storage.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/version.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/virtual_column.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/yt_database_base.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/yt_directory_database.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/yt_to_ch_block_converter.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/yt_to_ch_column_converter.cpp
)


add_global_library_for(yt-chyt-server.global
  yt-chyt-server)


target_compile_options(yt-chyt-server.global PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
)

target_include_directories(yt-chyt-server.global PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/clickhouse/base
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/double-conversion
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Foundation/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Net/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/Util/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/poco/XML/include
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/re2
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/rapidjson/include
)

target_link_libraries(yt-chyt-server.global PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-query-engine
  yt-chyt-client
  chyt-client-protos
  chyt-server-protos
  ytserver
  server-lib-chunk_pools
  yt-yt-ytlib
  yt-library-clickhouse_discovery
  yt-library-clickhouse_functions
  yt-library-monitoring
  library-tracing-jaeger
  library-profiling-perf
  yt-library-server_program
  cpp-yt-mlock
  contrib-clickhouse-src
  clickhouse-base-base
  contrib-deprecated-clickhouse_data_streams_compat
)

target_sources(yt-chyt-server.global PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/chyt/server/functions_version.cpp
)
